p.k: An intimate look at the life and career of John Wayne. Born Marion Morrison, the former football player would become one of the most iconic actors of the 20th century
Leading film critics discuss the career of Charlton Heston. After humble beginnings on stage, he took Hollywood by storm with starring in Ben-Hur and Planet of the Apes

p.n: Andre Rieu: Live In Maastricht IV
p.k: Fantastic summer concert from the King of Waltz's hometown. Soprano Mirusia Louwerse joins Andre Rieu at the Vrijthof, along with soloists he met during
Mr Know-All When pretty hotel worker Elly is charmed by a guest, archaeologist Max Kelada, it seems that the Mr Know-All professor might not be the man he claims to be
The Man From The South A young American couple on holiday meet a mysterious old gentleman who makes them a macabre wager
Mrs Bixby and the Colonel's Coat Unable to show her dentist husband Cyril the fur coat her lover has given her, Mrs Bixby proceeds to hatch a clever plan
William and Mary When her husband William dies, Mary Pearl is shocked that his will stipulates that his brain should be kept alive - with interesting results
Lamb to the Slaughter When Mary kills her husband with a frozen leg of lamb, she must think quickly to hide the evidence
A look back at the glamorous life and hugely-successful career of Academy Award-winning actor and cultural icon Humphrey Bogart
A portrait of blue-eyed Hollywood superstar Burt Lancaster. A self-taught actor, he shot to fame in The Killers before starring in From Here to Eternity and Atlantic City
Profile of Academy Award-winning actor Henry Fonda, whose long and glittering film career included roles in The Grapes of Wrath, On Golden
Film critics explore the remarkable life and career of cinematic pioneer Charlie Chaplin, whose contribution to film won him a 12-minute standing ovation
A look at the extraordinary career of the Ninotchka and Grand Hotel star. An incredibly private actress, Greta Garbo never married and retired when she was just 35
The story of the cultural, social, and political changes that were brought about following the 1967 Summer of Love in San Francisco
The Band The story of rockers The Band whose earthy mix of American folklore and myth included much-covered classic The Weight

p.n: The Grateful Dead: Music Icons I (9)
p.k: A look at Californian rock band The Grateful Dead, who emerged from the counterculture of the 60s with a diverse, eclectic style that fused myriad musical genres

p.n: Creedence Clearwater Revival: Music Icons I (7)
p.k: The story of Creedence Clearwater Revival, the Californian rock band that, for a short while, were the biggest band in America
A look at the life and music of Janis Joplin. Known for her powerful, blues-inspired vocals, she rose to fame in the late 1960s before dying of a drug overdose in 1970
A look at the rise of rock opera pioneers The Who, from their formation at school in Acton, London, to their award-winning albums and sell out tours around the world
Music experts discuss the life and music of Jimi Hendrix, who wowed audiences in the 1960s with his outrageous electric guitar playing skills and his experimental sound
A fascinating look at the music and legacy of Jefferson Airplane, the San Francisco rock band that pioneered psychedelic rock
New. Musician Carlos Santana became famous in the late 60s and early 70s with his band, Santana, which pioneered a fusion of rock and Latin American jazz

p.n: New: The Festival That Rocked The...
p.k: New. Exclusive interviews and astonishing footage tell the epic story of the 1969 Woodstock festival. In a time of civil unrest, half a million people
